attributes.action: Remove the sweeping powers granted in the proposed Digital Economy Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clause 11 of the digital economy bill gives the Secretary of State the power by minsterial order to make any ISP [internet service provider] take technical measures against any subscriber. We believe such powers require appropriate checks and balances and should be properply defined so as not to be open for abuse. We also believe the bill should not be handing control of the internet to any single minister.
